DRYER: One who, or that which, dries; a desiccative.
EARTH: The third planet of the Solar System; the world upon which humans live.
FOOTBALL: (general) A sport played on foot in which teams attempt to get a ball into a goal or zone defended by the other team.
PINWHEEL: An artificial flower with a stem, usually plastic, for children: the flower spins round in the wind, like a small paper windmill.
